name: In Reserves We Trust
title: Largest Foreign Reserves
description: In 2021, Russia held the largest foreign reserves in the world, amounting to $63.57 billion, showcasing its strong financial position.

name: Social Safety Net Champions
title: Comprehensive Social Insurance Coverage
description: By 2017, Russia had extensive social insurance coverage, with 64.6% of the 2nd quintile and 61.6% of the 3rd quintile population covered, reflecting a robust social safety net.

name: Educated Nation
title: High Doctoral Attainment
description: As of 2023, 24.38% of Russians aged 25+ held a doctoral degree, with 25.85% of females and 22.55% of males achieving this level of education, indicating a highly educated populace.

name: Fiscal Flexibility
title: Significant Net Lending
description: In 2023, Russia demonstrated fiscal strength with a net lending of 5.86 trillion rubles, highlighting its ability to manage public finances effectively.

name: Food Security Achievers
title: Minimal Severe Food Insecurity
description: In 2017, only 0.6% of the Russian population experienced severe food insecurity, showcasing effective food security measures.

name: Support for the Needy
title: High Unemployment Benefits for the Poorest
description: In 2017, 46.41% of unemployment benefits were directed towards the poorest quintile, reflecting a commitment to supporting the most vulnerable.
